body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Matthew Hughes and the customer's name is Shirley Young.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Matthew Hughes, and I’m with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Shirley! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with the motorcycle options available.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I totally understand. There are so many choices out there! Can I ask you what type of riding you plan to do?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I want something for weekend rides, maybe some longer trips.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds exciting! To help narrow down the options, could you please provide me with your age?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I am thirty-five years old.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for sharing! And could you also tell me your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My zip code is two zero two zero six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! I have some great options in mind for you, Shirley. Thank you for your time today!
